attributes.action: Introduce 20% VAT on all forms of betting including online gambling etc
attributes.additional_details: The UK Gambling Commission (UKGC) revealed financial figures for the 12 months ending September 2014 which showed the UK gambling industry is worth £7.1 billion, not including the National Lottery. These figures alone would achieve tax income of £1.42 billion
attributes.background: Online betting is being encouraged by high profile media advertising and sponsorships. It is a huge industry and the tax revenue it could generate would go a long way toward balancing the nation's books. In addition to this the act of taxation may discourage certain people from becoming addicted.
